name: Disney Challenge 3 Quiz | Movie Mixture | 25 Questions

questions.text: Name the cowgirl in 'Toy Story 2'?
Which of the seven dwarfs is the leader in 'Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs'?
Which Disney film was an Academy Award winner for the Best Original Score and Song 'A Whole New World'?
'Hakuna Matata' is a song from which Disney film?
What is the name of the snake in 'The Jungle Book'?
This film features the free-swinging alley cat named Thomas O'Malley.
How many of the following novels are by author Roald Dahl: 'The Witches', 'Matilda', 'James and the Giant Peach', 'Charlie and the Chocolate Factory'?
questions.explanation:
All of these.

	The movie version of 'Charlie' was called 'Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory'.

questions.text: During which war is 'Bedknobs and Broomsticks' set?
In which Disney movie does Mickey Rooney's voice 'Tod' and Kurt Russell's voice 'Copper' appear?
Who describes herself as 'practically perfect'?
Which Disney film features the songs 'I'm Wishing' and 'With a Smile and a Song'?
questions.correct: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs
questions.explanation:
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs.

	Snow White sings 'I'm Wishing' as she goes to the well to fill her wash pail and an echo duplicates her voice.

questions.text: Name the schooner in 'Treasure Island'?
questions.explanation:
Hispaniola.

	Israel Hand is one of Long John Silver's pirates. The Admiral Benbow was a deserted inn where Black Dog leaves his message for Captain Billy Bones with young Jim Hawkins.

questions.text: Which Disney film features the song, 'A E I O U'?
questions.explanation:
Alice in Wonderland.

	The opium smoking caterpillar asks Alice 'Who-O R U?

questions.text: Who does Maleficent kidnap so he won't be able to rescue Sleeping Beauty?
'That Darn Cat!' (1965) refers to D.C. belonging to Patti Randall and her sister Ingrid. What breed of cat is D.C.?
Which Disney film features the song 'Little April Shower'?
This film features a Scottish terrier called Jock and a bloodhound devoid of a sense of smell called Trusty?
Which Disney film features the songs, 'Out There' and 'Hellfire'?
What is the surname of Roger in '101 Dalmatians'?
The song 'Once Upon a Dream' features in which Disney film?
In 'Mary Poppins' who plays the part of the very, very old chairman of the bank board of directors, Mr. Dawes Senior?
In 'The Little Mermaid 2, Return to the Sea', name the shark?
Which animated Disney film do you meet a character called Gideon?
questions.explanation:
Pinocchio.

	Gideon is the feline sidekick of sly fox J. Worthington Foulfellow 'Honest John' who dissuades Pinocchio from going to school and tells him about the wonders of the stage.

questions.text: This Disney film contains the songs 'The Life I Lead' and 'Step in Time'?
In 'Hercules', James Woods voices Hades, Danny DeVito voices Phil but who is the Narrator?
questions.explanation:
Charlton Heston.

	Hope you enjoyed the quiz. If you did, have you tried the first two Disney quizzes?
